This game is amazing and a must play for any steam user. The world quite immersive, allowing you to explore and view scenes the way you want to. Interested? Whatch what's going on. Don't care? Just walk around and look at something more interesting as the other characters talk. There are no cutscenes and the game is just a wonderful sci-fi adventure. The only negative I can think of is that you might never get to see Half Life 3...
IS FUCKING AMAZING *I need Half Life 2: Episode 3 in my life:( *
Believe the HYPE! One of the best games ever made.

This game is an icon for it's time and with it's highly modding capabilities still being used even to this day which the original set off the first person persective through out the whole game including cutscenes. Half-Life 2 took what Half-Life had that and put at the time better awesome physics, graphics, lighting, advent of Steam and birth of Valve's Source Engine.

One of the best childhood memorys in terms of video games.

I like the overall setting and the story is well written. The gunplay feels so direct an solid and the grapics are still awesome.
The gamplay is so much fun, you feeling the game, the situation in which Gorden Freeman fights for Humanity. 

But the real Question is... will it be continued?

O enredo junto a jogabilidade de fácil aprendizado do game são capazes de te envolver do começo ao fim, possui uma física impressionante se levarmos em consideração que já se fazem 12 anos desde o seu lançamento e pra época ele certamente foi um divisor de águas no mundo dos games, recomendo pra quem curte um bom fps aliado de uma boa narrativa.
 Por se tratar de um jogo de 2004 os requisitos de sistema do jogo não serão um problema para a grande maioria dos setup's para quem tiver interesse em joga-lo.

Très bonne suite au premier Hal-Life. Ce jeu reste une référence en matière de fps, beaucoup de grands studios ce sont inspirés de cette license pour faire leurs jeux. Jouez à celui-ci et aux deux extensions suivantes (HL2 épisodes 1 & 2) et vous verrez ce que signifie attendre Half-Life 3 depuis bientôt 15 ans. Une perle du monde vidéo-ludique, qui a du mal a être détronnée. Je le conseille à tous les amateurs de fps.
Half-Life 3 !!

masterpiece.
the best game

One of the greatest FPS of all time. Greatly pushed the boundaries for FPS forward by its inclusion of; engaging storytelling, immersive and imaginative world, excellent and interesting varied gameplay ranging from classic and satisfying gunplay to physics based puzzles, as well as a very memorable soundtrack. A must play for anyone. As great to play as it was when it first released. It stands the test of time. A game that truly deserves a sequel. Game of the year..
Старая добрая классика. Это игра с которой всё начиналось) Всем рекомендую пройти хоть раз, а лучше и не раз)
A legendary game. I will love it forever.
Still my favorite game and its over 12 years old

First game I had ever purchased and it will always be one of my top favorites. It has aged well for how long it has been out, but has stood against the test of time for many PC gamers. This is easily a MUST PLAY for any new or veteran gamer.

You can feel the history of games changing while playing Half-Life 2. Basically every FPS that came afterward got their level design from this game, and that is not even mentioning the physics revolution that Source brought to the table. Indeed, a timeless classic, that did not age at all. Still fun to play and look at, even 12 years after its release.

10/10, nearly perfect.

Probably one of the best timeless masterpieces to have been created. Aged nicely, although it is showing it a little and could do with an update if you know what I mean. Challenging yet rewarding gameplay that has been captured in little else.
jamais ce jeu ne sera démodé l'un des meilleur FPS au monde ,en espérant voir un III un jour avec de beau graphisme

I enjoyed my time playing this game. The physics are fun but a little overused, but it dosen't detract from the game too much. Any PC user should at least try the half-life games, and if you don't like them, you can always refund (given you haven't played too much).
This game has been and still been good for 12 years so it should win.
Utterly amazing

Personally one of my favorite games of all time and still worth playing. A great story, great single player combat feel, great map design and set pieces.

I nominated it for the "Test of Time" steam award. It's been out for over a decade and I still come back and play it.

Blah, blah, blah, Mr. Freeman

Легенда, которая будет вечно жить в моем сердце. С этой серии и началась моя история. История ПК гейминга. Первой игрой запущенной на моем первом компьютере была Half-Life. Оооо даааа далёкий 99ый) Pentium III 500MHz 64mb Ram Voodoo3 3dfx. Спустя 5 лет, да, именно столько я сидел с конфигой компа отмеченного выше мне наконец то купили новый. Ииии, дааааа, первой игрой запущенной на нем была Вторая Халфа. Как сейчас помню этот восторг, панический восторг от происходящего на экране. В общем, друзья, словами это не описать!!!  И разумеется началом этого восторга было появление на экране G-Man'a, легендарное - So wake up mr. Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes. После которого и начинается самое лучшее приключение в жизни. Какую игру я буду любить вечно - Half-Life 2. Какую игру я буду перепроходить как в первый раз - Half-Life 2. В общем суть вы уловили. Half-Life 2 - как шикарный виски, с годами только лучше!
